sla-dict.description: Where to request instances. Each key is a query string for criterions (e.g. "computer_guid=foo"), and each value is a list of partition references (note: Zope partitions reference must be prefixed with "zope-").

timezone.description: Zope's timezone. Possible values are determined by host's libc, and typically come from a separate package (tzdata, ...)

developer-list.description: List of logins which should get the Developper role (required to modify portal_components' content), defaulting to inituser-login's value

additionalProperties.description: A hostname to which current entry will resolve

hosts-dict.description: Host entries to be used in addition to and/or overriding auto-generated ones (erp5-catalog-0, erp5-cloudooo, erp5-memcached-persistent, erp5-memcached-volatile and erp5-smtp)

.*.description: An IP or domain name to which current entry will resolve

software-url.description: Front-end's software type. If this parameter is empty, no front-end instance is requested. Else, sla-dict must specify 'frontend' which is a special value matching all frontends (e.g. {"instance_guid=bar": ["frontend"]}).

domain.description: The domain name to request front-end to respond as.

software-type.description: Request a front-end slave instance of this software type.

family.description: The family this partition is part of. For example: 'public', 'admin', 'backoffice', 'web-service'... Each family gets its own balancer entry. It has no special meaning for the system.

instance-count.description: Number of Zopes to setup on this partition

thread-amount.description: Number of worker threads for each created Zope process

timerserver-interval.description: Timerserver tick perdiod, in seconds, or 0 to disable

webdav.description: Serve webdav queries, implies timerserver-interval=0 (disabled). Mixing webdav and non-webdav nodes in a single family will give unspecified results.

longrequest-logger-interval.description: Period, in seconds, with which LongRequestLogger polls worker thread stack traces, or -1 to disable

longrequest-logger-timeout.description: Transaction duration after which LongRequestLogger will start logging its stack trace, in seconds

allOf.description: Start allocating ports at this value. Useful if one needs to make several partitions share the same port range (ie, several partitions bound to a single address)
Start allocating ports at this value, going upward

backup-periodicity.description: When to backup, specified in the same format as for systemd.time(7) calendar events (years & seconds not supported, DoW & DoM can not be combined). Enter 'never' to disable backups.

tidstorage-repozo-path.description: Directory for backup timestamp and tidstorage status files.

zodb.description: Zope Object DataBase mountpoints. See https://github.com/zopefoundation/ZODB/blob/3.10/src/ZODB/component.xml for extra options.

server.description: Instantiate a server. If missing, 'storage-dict' must contain the necessary properties to mount the ZODB. For ZEO, the partition reference is 'zodb'. For NEO, they are 'neo-0', 'neo-1', ...

storage-dict.description: Storage configuration. For NEO, 'logfile' is automatically set (see https://lab.nexedi.com/nexedi/neoppod/blob/master/neo/client/component.xml for other settings).

ssl.description: For external NEO. Pass false if you want to disable SSL or pass custom values for ca/cert/key.

enable.description: Whether to enable creation of associated slave Jupyter instance

zope-family.description: Zope family to connect Jupyter to by default
